body.contents: InstantClick.init(); if (INSTALL_OPTIONS.progressBar !== true) { document.head.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', '<style>#instantclick { display: none; }</style>'); } else { if (INSTALL_OPTIONS.progressBarColor) { document.head.insertAdjacentHTML('beforeend', '<style>#instantclick-bar { background-color: ' + INSTALL_OPTIONS.progressBarColor + '; }</style>'); } }

progressBar.title: Show progress bar
progressBar.description: When navigating from one page to another, show a loading progress bar at the top of the page.

progressBarColor.title: Progress bar color
progressBarColor.description: The color of the progress bar. (Requires "Show progress bar" to be checked.)
